name: backend-task
description: A simple backend task for the hakerbay interview

scripts.test_coverage: set NODE_ENV=test&& npm run run_migrations && npm run run_seeders && babel-node ./node_modules/babel-istanbul/lib/cli.js cover -x /server/models/index.js ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- server/Tests/Controllers/usersTests.js --exit
scripts.test_and_coverage: npm run test && npm run test_coverage
scripts.run_migrations: set NODE_ENV=test&& sequelize db:migrate:undo:all && sequelize db:migrate
scripts.run_seeders: set NODE_ENV=test&& sequelize db:seed:undo:all && sequelize db:seed:all
scripts.test: npm run run_migrations && npm run run_seeders && npm run run_test

author: Ademola Hussain
